title: Two Nominations Sent to the Senate â€“ The White House
content:
Nominations & Appointments			
Issued on:
November 14, 2018
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Joseph V. Cuffari, of Arizona, to be Inspector General, Department of Homeland Security, vice John Roth.Neomi J. Rao, of the District of Columbia, to be United States Circuit Judge for the District of Columbia Circuit, vice Brett M. Kavanaugh, elevated.
